item.title: CVE-2024-8067|2024-09-24T18:37:53.919Z -- helix -- helix%20core
item.description: In versions of Helix Core prior to 2024.1 Patch 2 (2024.1/2655224) a Windows ANSI API Unicode "best fit" argument injection was identified.
